page.title: 20FARMING cont: CREDITS
page.content:
Other machinery includes ploughs, drills, seed harrows, trailers, culti- vators and corn driers. Changes made in farms over the past few years include reclamation of derelict land (one farm had reclaimed 180 acres over 9 years), planting of trees and shrubs - hawthorn, larch, beech, oak & pine- and drainage of land. All farmers were unhappy that increased mechanisa- ion had resulted in loss of labour. On some farms, cottages had been allocated to non-farming people. The owner of one farm owns a thriving Wild Life Park and houses his employees in farming cotta- ges. All complained at increased costs with no comparable increase in income.
CREDITS: This survey has been carried out by members of Filkins & Broughton Poggs Women's Institute, in West Oxfordshire.
